name: Little Yum-Yum: Food Kids Game
description:
If you want your kids to have much fun picking yummy food for a little beastie, you really need to try out this game!

Recommended for children 2-4 years of age, the game encourages to distinguish edible and inedible things feeding a gluttonous adorable beastie Yum-Yum.

Your child is challenged to pick out the healthiest food for Yum-Yum!

This game contains a variety of edible items that belong to 5 categories: vegetables, fruits, ready-to-eat food, drinks and desserts, but not all these products are equally healthy for Yum-Yum. There is beastie’s fridge in the game to check available and “frozen” products.


Key Features:

- An expansive collection of food in each theme

- Intuitive user interface and touch control

- Bonus Yum-Yum’s dancing

- Yum-Yum’s hilarious reactions to edible and inedible items


Try the game for free!

To safeguard against accidental in-app purchases, the user must correctly solve a skill testing math problem to proceed.
